common: Biliary obstruction, concurrent antihypertensives, concurrent cancer chemotherapy, concurrent radiation therapy, hepatic insufficiency, hypertension

description.common: coenzyme Q10, warfarin. unspecified interaction mechanism. Use Caution/Monitor. The data from studies and case reports is conflicting.
atorvastatin decreases levels of coenzyme Q10 by unspecified interaction mechanism. Minor/Significance Unknown.
